keyPolicies.policyDescription: Balance the books and cut the deficit every year.
Freeze energy bills until 2017 and raise the minimum wage to £8.
Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs.
Stop people who come here from claiming benefits for two years.
Reduce tuition fees to £6,000 and guarantee apprenticeships.
Cut stamp duty to zero for first-time buyers and ensure secure, three-year rents capped by inflation.

issues.economy: Balance the books and cut the deficit every year. Freeze energy bills until 2017 and raise the minimum wage to £8.
issues.education: Reduce tuition fees to £6,000 and guarantee apprenticeships.
issues.health: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs.
issues.immigration: Stop people who come here from claiming benefits for two years.

housing.content: Cut stamp duty to zero for first-time buyers and ensure secure, three-year rents capped by inflation.

images.caption: Labour's contract with you: [list of key policies]
